snippet: Chris Pine and Ben Foster team up to play mercenaries in a solid thriller about losing your faith and finding yourself in a violent reckoning.

headline: 10 New Books We Recommend This Week
snippet: Suggested reading from critics and editors at The New York Times.

headline: After a Boycott, Chinese Television Is Again Airing N.B.A. Games
snippet: China Central Television stopped showing the games in 2019 after a Houston Rockets executive expressed support for pro-democracy demonstrators in Hong Kong.
keywords: ['Politics and Government', 'Basketball', 'Human Rights and Human Rights Violations', 'Hong Kong Protests (2019)']

headline: Graham, Once a Backer of Jackson, Says He Will Oppose Her Confirmation
snippet: Senator Lindsey Graham voted last year to confirm Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to an influential appeals court. He now calls her an “activist judge” who should not ascend to the Supreme Court.
keywords: ['Appointments and Executive Changes', 'United States Politics and Government']

headline: European leaders again reject Russia’s demand that gas deliveries be paid in rubles.
snippet: Existing contracts that allow for payments in Western currencies must be upheld, European leaders insist, while economists contemplate Putin’s motives.
keywords: ['Ruble (Currency)', 'Natural Gas', 'Russian Invasion of Ukraine (2022)', 'Embargoes and Sanctions', 'Currency', 'International Trade and World Market']

headline: ‘Apollo 10½: A Space Age Childhood’ Review: OK, Boomer
snippet: Richard Linklater’s new animated film tells the story of the moon landing with some tongue-in-cheek revisionism.

headline: Ukraine has asked for ‘security guarantees’ to make peace with Russia. What does that mean?
snippet: Ukraine’s request for other countries to guarantee its future security as a condition for making concessions to Moscow is circulating among European diplomats. But analysts say such a demand faces huge obstacles.

headline: Vegetarian Pastas I’m Craving
snippet: After some time away from home, nothing satisfies like vegetable Bolognese.

headline: Many Teens Report Emotional and Physical Abuse by Parents During Lockdown
snippet: New data on teen mental health during the pandemic suggests that for many, home life was full of stressors like job loss, hunger and even violence.
keywords: ['Anxiety and Stress', 'Teenagers and Adolescence', 'Coronavirus (2019-nCoV)', 'Mental Health and Disorders', 'Depression (Mental)', 'Quarantines', 'Child Abuse and Neglect', 'Research', 'Suicides and Suicide Attempts', 'Youth', 'Domestic Violence', 'your-feed-healthcare']

headline: Hugs to Boring
snippet: Don’t underestimate the tech that makes your eyes glaze over. It holds us all up.

headline: Review: In ‘I Agree to the Terms,’ It’s Raining Pennies From Amazon
snippet: The Builders Association explores the world of turkers, workers performing thousands of weird, low-paying tasks for an online giant.

headline: What Students Are Saying About How Social Media Affects Their Body Image
snippet: A recent article put a spotlight on how social media can fuel body dysmorphia in boys. We asked teenagers how these apps make them feel about the way they look.
